If we alter the functions \\( u(t) \\) and \\( v(t) \\) via a perturbing matrix D applied at an intermediate time \\( t_1 \\), and observe the transformed functions \\( \\tilde{u}(t) \\) and \\( \\tilde{v}(t) \\), will the resulting behaviors at time T depend only on A and B?
